EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / Mary Ann Markowicz (1365020214.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Mary Ann Markowicz (1365020214.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - Consultant Services Email - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Mary Ann, Great to hear from you and thank you so much for the update! Ive enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful in finding your next project: - Here is a short list of some of our top clients within MBO Access <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Access_Information.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D>. - We have an index of recorded Webinars that will comprehensively cover everything to do with working independently. You can see them by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D>. - You can review our Independents Guide by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D> - You can join MBOs LinkedIn in group by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=71161&mostPopular=&trk=tyah&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D>. - Lastly, you can view all the information we spoke about over the phone by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D> (Please bookmark this page.) I will follow up with you, if you have questions before then, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D> Best of luck finding your next contract, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D> Weve got some serious perks youre eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Mary Ann Markowicz [mailto:maryannmarkowicz@hotmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, April 02, 2013 4:03 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: MBO Partners / Mary Ann Markowicz Hi Sara, Thanks for the reach out. I just rolled off of an engagement in Manila and am in search for new work. So, if you have any leads, Id be open to hearing about them. Hope you are doing well From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>] Sent: Tuesday, April 02, 2013 12:37 PM To: maryannmarkowicz@hotmail.com <mailto:maryannmarkowicz@hotmail.com> Subject: MBO Partners / Mary Ann Markowicz Hello Mary Ann, As a courtesy I wanted to follow up with you to see how the contract search was going. Any update would be great,Sara___________________________________Sara Conde Consultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: (703) 793-6028f: 703-793-6070e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC02MzUmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTYzNSZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTYxNjEzNjQmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUyMzk4MjUmZW1haWxpZD1tYXJ5YW5ubWFya293aWN6QGhvdG1haWwuY29tJnVzZXJpZD1sLTEyOC0yNjI2MS05OTAyNS0xJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsXx4uwvXLHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YECTtQhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X></b
